instructions: Heat some oil in a pot.
Add the chicken pieces and sauté for about 10 minutes.
Add the diced carrot and onion.
Add water, and when it reaches a boil, add the dumplings.
notes: To prepare the dumplings: Mix water, flour, and salt to create a soft batter. Use a spoon to drop the batter into the boiling water. Enjoy your meal!
